description: Comprehensive household management system for single parents and busy families
use_case: Real single parent workflow for managing children's schedules, household tasks, finances, and family coordination

workflow_steps.name: family_setup
workflow_steps.description: Configure family members, schedules, and responsibilities
workflow_steps.automation: Auto-sync school calendars, generate age-appropriate chore lists

workflow_steps.name: schedule_coordination
workflow_steps.description: Manage activities, appointments, and commitments for all family members
workflow_steps.automation: Conflict detection, reminder notifications, carpool optimization

workflow_steps.name: household_tasks
workflow_steps.description: Track cleaning, maintenance, and daily household responsibilities
workflow_steps.automation: Rotating chore assignments, maintenance reminders, shopping list generation

workflow_steps.name: financial_coordination
workflow_steps.description: Manage household budget, expenses, and family financial goals
workflow_steps.automation: Expense categorization, budget alerts, savings progress tracking

workflow_steps.name: emergency_preparedness
workflow_steps.description: Maintain emergency contacts, plans, and important document access
workflow_steps.automation: Emergency notification system, document backup, contact verification
